data.text: @Em_3489 I know, I was specifically told it couldn’t be cancelled because the splints were specially made. Now I’m just waiting until they ring to find out the new date. I know Christmas is my favourite holiday and this would just ruin it 🙄

@Em_3489 Thanks. I’m just so fed up of being in pain and looking this way. Everyone took time off and used holidays to look after me I feel so bad 👎🏻 when we spoke the next one was December time so I’m not sure until I speak with them tomorrow 😕 it’s just a joke like 🙄

@Em_3489 My op was cancelled even though I was told it couldn’t be. Taken time off work which is now unpaid, for them to say we will ring you tomorrow with a new date. That doesn’t help me with uni and stuff as the date we picked was picked so we wouldn’t risk messing uni up 🙄
